categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Tawss Khaa was a female Nimbanel, who was thought to have prophetic powers and was living in Mos Eisley, Tatooine, as of 0 BBY. Seated behind Leesub Sirln, she sampled a drink in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina as Luke Skywalker entered with his droids C-3PO and R2-D2. Later she traveled past Docking Bay 94 as Han Solo entered. She was trained in the ways of the Sakiyan hunters and later chose to work for the Rebel Alliance as a scout.

In Insider #130 - "The Unusual Suspects: Who's Who in Mos Eisley" the identified images of Mosep Binneed and Tawss Khaa differ from those previously used by Decipher. In Insider #130, Mosep is now established as having white hair and a topknot.
